mapper.sql:
SELECT a.device_id, a.device_name, a.device_keeper_id, c.emp_name, a.device_status, a.device_status_id, a.device_type_id, b.device_type_name, a.device_manufacture_date, a.device_purchase_date, a.device_purchase_price, a.device_service_life, a.note
FROM device a LEFT JOIN device_type b ON a.device_type_id = b.device_type_id LEFT JOIN employee c ON a.device_keeper_id = c.emp_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (device_id, device_name, device_keeper_id, device_status, device_status_id, device_type_id, device_manufacture_date, device_purchase_date, device_purchase_price, device_service_life, note) VALUES (deviceId,deviceName,deviceKeeperId,deviceStatus,deviceStatusId,deviceTypeId,deviceManufactureDate, devicePurchaseDate,devicePurchasePrice,deviceServiceLife,note)
mapper.update: update device set device_id=#{up.deviceId}, device_name=#{up.deviceName}, device_keeper_id=#{up.deviceKeeperId}, device_status=#{up.deviceStatus}, device_status_id=#{up.deviceStatusId}, device_type_id=#{up.deviceTypeId}, device_manufacture_date=#{up.deviceManufactureDate}, device_purchase_date=#{up.devicePurchaseData}, device_purchase_price=#{up.devicePurchasePrice}, device_service_life=#{up.deviceServiceLife}, note=#{up.note}
